title: Smart Data Models - Smart Data Models - Smart Data Models - Health - Medical Checks / Procedure
description: A medical procedure involving an incision with instruments; performed for diagnose, or therapeutic purposes..

date.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Date when the procedure take place. Model: 'https://schema.org/Date'

ischemiaTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Number of minutes the patient was in ischemia

donorAge.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Age of the donor. Model: 'https://schema.org/Integer'

donorGender.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Gender of the Donor. Model:'https://schema.org/GenderType'

patient.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Id of the patient
